But now that I have prime I'm really able to get my value from prime.I just wish they sold a secondary power adapter so I don't have to plug /unplug from the tv and outlet each time!

review: When it works, I've been pleased with it...however the "when it works" part is infrequent.  The apps crash a lot and lately I've been getting a fair amount of reboots lately.  Based on a suggestion I found, I've replaced the power adapter with a higher powered one and that seems to have helped. The whole thing is pretty buggy but that's what happens with first generation stuff.  I own the Roku 3, Chromecast, and this.  The Roku is by far the best in terms of performance, quality, and ease of use.  Unfortunately, it's also the most expensive.  That being said, I'll keep the first stick around but I'm getting another Roku 3 for my traveling.  I've had enough of my trial by Fire.
